title: The Real Story Behind the ‘Abandoned’ Girls Hockey Team in Oz
subtitle: Did the Sports Authorities of India have any connection with the ‘abandoned’ girls hockey team in Australia?
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video of the Indian girls hockey team surfaced on social media, creating quite a stir about how officials from the country don’t care about their sports teams.

The players expressed their concerns over not being given transportation or food during their stay in Australia for the Pacific School Games. Teams from around the world compete in the tournament.

Their coach, Pradeep Kumar, is seen in the video saying the team has missed matches due to lack of facilities.
